name: Three heroines of Makoto Shinkai disaster movie series  新海诚灾难电影系列女主合集
description:
The best three love anime movies in my mind

This is a collection of LORAs of the heroines of Makoto Shinkai disaster movie series, including MIYAMIZU MITSUHA, AMANO HINA and SUZUME

Here are the instructions for each of the three LORAs

Miyamizu Mitsuha

CFG Scale：4

lora'strenth：0.65-0.85

Clothes prompts：red bowtie, yellow school uniform, white shirt, black school skirt

trigger word：miyamizu_mitsuha

Amano Hina

CFG Scale：4

lora'strenth：0.5-0.8

Clothes prompts：white sleeveless jacket、denim shorts、twin tails、black long hair、blue eyes

trigger word：amano_hina

Suzume

CFG Scale：4

lora'strenth：0.65-0.85

Clothes prompts： brown eyes, black hair, hairclip, single drill, red ribbon, short sleeves school uniform, green school skirt, black socks, black shoes,

trigger word：suzu_me

Better use Hires.fix to generate imgs:

width and height: 512*768

Denoising strength: 0.45

Upscaler: R-ESRGAN 4x+ Anime6B

Upscale by 1.8

————————————————————————————————————————

————————————————————————————————————————

三部曲总算是肝完了，诚哥，纯爱界永远的神

新海诚三大灾难电影女主合集—宫水三叶、天野阳菜、岩户铃芽

下面分别是这三个lora的使用说明

岩户铃芽

CFG Scale推荐4

权重：0.65-0.85

服装tag：brown eyes, black hair, hairclip, single drill, red ribbon, short sleeves school uniform, green school skirt, black socks, black shoes,,

触发词：suzu_me

宫水三叶

CFG Scale推荐4

权重：0.65-0.85

服装tag：red bowtie, yellow school uniform, white shirt, black school skirt,

触发词：miyamizu_mitsuha

天野阳菜

CFG Scale推荐4

权重：0.5-0.8

服装tag：white sleeveless jacket、denim shorts、twin tails、black long hair、blue eyes

触发词：suzu_me

一定要用高分重绘生成图片，参考设置如下：

分辨率: 512*768

重绘幅度: 0.45

放大算法: SwinIR 4x

放大倍数：1.8
